tweets.text: @EnvAgency any idea who to report this to? River Colne in Rickmansworth and appears to be leaking oil 🤷🏻‍♂️ https://t.co/30bErovPIG

Are you a #ScrapMetal dealer who's been approached to buy a #CatalyticConverter or do you know is buying stolen metals? We will continue to visit dealers to give them advice, and check their compliance. Tell us who https://t.co/JICMYLRoCv @CrimestoppersUK https://t.co/EDX2s3uj9k

@MrMarkwarren1 @maricaoneill @AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgencyMids @PHE_WestMids @StinkStopthe Anxiety is off the scale and I don't know if it is that or the gases that are the cause of my palpitations every time they flood through my home 😢

@MrMarkwarren1 @AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgencyMids @PHE_WestMids @StinkStopthe I have to go back to Wales at the end of the month to care for my Dad while my Mum is having an operation. I am looking forward to it in order to escape the stink. At least it alleviates my worry about the parents a bit.

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids Close it down Clare.  How can you not? The beast is out of control & @RedIndustries2 @WalleysL can’t tame it. Bring in specialists. You’ve seen a letter from the Consultant Paediatrician stating the landfill is exacerbating respiratory problems in a CHILD! @BorisJohnson step up!

tweets.text: the wind was blowing in the opposite direction to Hanford blowing away from walleys quarry and I walked up the back of Michelin sports ground in Trent vale and I smelled landfill all  along the Lyme brook 🤷🏽‍♂️I was wondering if the wind was coming my way but it wasn’t. https://t.co/aIvnNJ6ULn

tweets.text: 1.45 am the stench from walleys quarry ltd, was @RedIndustries2 woken the whole house again, headache can't breathe feel sick, got to be in work in 6 hrs or will lose job, we aren't the ones who shou,d be losing our jobs @ClareDinnisEA @AaronBell4NUL evacuate the town .

I don't usually do this sort of thing, but when it is on my local patch it really gets to me!! Scrub & tree removal in May is terrible practice. Please retweet. https://t.co/cYEIymHH0K Two videos showing the area & my concerns. @DevonWildlife @Natures_Voice @EnvAgency @kiergroup https://t.co/U8doUyBP5K

urls.title: Revealed: no penalties issued under 'useless' English farm pollution laws
urls.description: Exclusive: Environment Agency has failed to prosecute or fine any of 243 documented violations since 2018

tweets.text:
The Environment Agency has documented 243 violations of the “farming rules for water” since they came into effect in April 2018 - but there have been no prosecutions or fines issued to polluters.

My latest exclusive for The Guardian:
https://t.co/Ulk5YMHkLZ

I had a wonderful day out yesterday 25 miles away from the stinking landfill, it made me to realise how anxious I am at home!
Does anyone feel the same, worried, concerned how this is affecting us short and long term where we have lived our lives beforehand free of pollution https://t.co/PhnIHb9Co6

Shame on you @EnvAgencyMids @PHE_uk @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA It’s not getting better! Residents of Staffordshire village launch fightback against a landfill https://t.co/cQ4CnRZz7f via @MailOnline #StopTheStink

Judging by social media it’s another appalling evening of odour - reports from Knutton, Milehouse, Wolstanton, Basford, Porthill. 😢🤢

Please keep reporting to the @EnvAgency on 0800 80 70 60 #StopTheStink

Are you spending time in the countryside this #BankHoliday weekend? 
 
To protect landscapes, wildlife and food crops, make sure you stick to marked paths and keep dogs on a lead. 
 
#RespectProtectEnjoy https://t.co/AbyTlbPIa3
@ClareNicklin @talkRADIO @EnvAgency It was on just after 15.30 #stopthestink: https://t.co/kYvY1IFDDF

Report every time you are exposed to the gas. The only thing that has forced the @EnvAgency to show any interest&put monitors in is the number of complaints (+10k in 2m) @Cap_it_off Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe #StopTheStink https://t.co/fmskkvcl6s

@DefraGovUK @MPGeorgeEustice @BorisJohnson an example of the failure of the @EnvAgency & @ClareDinnisEA to protect the people of N-u-L & allow the continuence of exposure to toxic LFG from @WalleysL @RedIndustries2 You need to act & use your power to stop this now. @StinkStopthe https://t.co/UUWkOCghBE

@SianieRoo @Bigdwazda @PHE_uk @AaronBell4NUL @BBCNews @itvnews @Channel5N @SOPH_C_ @EnvAgency @PHE_EoEngland @DefraGovUK Launch a campaign to call DEFRA daily with stories from the people, by the people impacted. No residences should be too close to a landfill plume. Controlled landfills should not be a problem if zoning is correctly applied.
